data.name: Agile Games New England 2020 Conference
data.description: We are excited to announce that Agile Games 2020 will be held June 1-3 at Boston University. This move allows us to continue growing in a space that allows this unique gathering to flourish.

Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest”, a 1-day event on Friday, April 17, 2020, 9:00AM to 5:00PM at the Microsoft offices at 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston,VA., 20190. We will be in Rooms 3028, 3054, 3058, and 3062.
